name: CAPSULE
headline: Buy anything you find on social media
description:
CAPSULE is a mobile app that makes it easy to save and buy the things you find on any social media platform. Just snap a screenshot of anything you like, from any platform, and we search the entire internet to instantly give you shoppable links. 

Instead of searching hundreds of websites and sifting through thousands of products on your own, CAPSULE lets you find inspiration from anywhere and uses advanced machine learning to return results that feel like magic.

**Company Overview: CAPSULE**

**Mission:** CAPSULE is on a mission to let you buy anything you discover on social media. Imagine spotting something you love in an Instagram post or TikTok video. With CAPSULE, you simply take a screenshot, and the app does the heavy lifting, finding shoppable links for those products from across the internet.

**How it Works:** Initially launched as a mobile app, CAPSULE employs advanced machine learning to transform social media inspiration into a streamlined shopping experience. Instead of spending hours browsing countless websites, CAPSULE allows you to easily convert any image, text, or even color into a fun shopping adventure that feels almost magical.

**Founded:** CAPSULE was established in 2022 and is currently part of the Y Combinator Batch S22. This accelerative environment aligns perfectly with its innovative approach to e-commerce and machine learning.

**Location and Team:** Based in San Francisco, CAPSULE operates with a small but dedicated team of four employees. The company enjoys guidance from Jared Friedman, a noted Group Partner at Y Combinator, which lends itself to a robust support system for growth and development.

**Tech Focus:** The company is tagged with labels such as artificial intelligence, generative AI, machine learning, computer vision, and e-commerce—all elements that highlight its tech-driven approach to modern shopping.

**Current Offerings:** CAPSULE isn’t just about finding products; it takes it a step further with features like:
- **Find Your Color Seasons:** A tool to help shoppers choose colors that fit their style.
- **Shop by Color:** An innovative way to discover products by color preferences.
- **Games:** An interactive element that integrates fun into the shopping experience.

You can check out their platform and download the app from their [website](https://www.shopcapsule.ai/) or directly via the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/capsule-shop-your-screenshots/id1642947474).

**Conclusion:** CAPSULE is carving out a niche in the e-commerce landscape, blending technology with user experience to facilitate effortless online shopping rooted in social media inspiration. With its playful approach and user-centered tools, it’s an exciting time for anyone looking to supercharge their shopping game.
